value:
I'm told this style of kimono is a New
Year's tradition. I am overcome by
the austere dignity of the garment...

I would like to wish you well in this
coming year, and express how glad
I am to be here, celebrating with you.

All the New Year's food is particularly
delicious... I do hope you can forgive
me for succumbing to my sleepiness.

There is a rumor about some special
gift for the new year... Can you tell
me about— Oh! It's for children. I see.

I've learned of a game that results in
the loser getting their face marked
with scribbles of ink...$k$pA game played with a Hero's dignity
on the line is quite the ruthless New
Year's custom, I must say!

Please allow me to humbly offer you
most sincere well-wishes on behalf
of $Nf.

I am reminded of the first sunrise of
the new year. I will strive for greater
heights in light of this blessing!

I hope to remain satisfied with the lot
that befits my station, and to not be
burdened with ambitious wanting...

This is rather unpleasant... I hope this
is not an ill portent for the remainder
of this year. I must be more diligent!

I will do everything I can to repay
this kind gift by making good use
of it on the battlefield!

Greetings and happy New Year's to
you. I, Ash, offer you my most sincere
well-wishes as retainer to Lord Askr.

Thank you, from the bottom of my
heart, for inviting me to this lovely
New Year's celebration.$k$pThe sight of all the extravagant foods
was almost too much for me. There
are so many options to choose from!$k$pI suppose I am taking a roundabout
way to wish you a happy New Year...
What I mean to say is that...$k$pNew Year's in Askr was a true joy, the
feast was delicious, and thank you for
inviting me! And happy New Year's.$k$p...Yes, I think that summed up my
feelings on the matter. I hope I was
as clear as I intended.$k$pAt any rate, I will work even more
diligently this year, and will devote
myself to being more help to you all.$k$pHm... I may have managed to still use
more words than necessary, but...you
understand, don't you?
To a joyous New Year!
I remain at your side!
I-I do not offer much…
We ought to celebrate!
I disappointed you…
Please allow me to humbly offer you my most sincere well wishes on the occasion of the new year.
Oh no! Did I make a mistake in the process of dressing myself? This is a complicated (if lovely) garment.
This kimono is so elegant and well made… I feel as if perhaps it may not befit one such as myself.
The various New Year's celebrations across the many worlds are all so intriguing. I find myself enthralled.
With all the treats available here, I am nearing the point where I must retire...
I am so deeply happy to be able to celebrate the coming new year with everyone here—and that Lord Askr could join the festivities as well.
This year I will strive to become a greater asset to you, and to remain diligent in that pursuit.
I'll take care of it!
How best to do this?
I offer a greeting.
